scripts.build:no_build: cd ../../Osa2/part1 && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../../Osa3/OpetusPart1
scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build && cd ../../Osa2/part1 && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../../Osa3/OpetusPart1
